1.title: Who am I?
1.preview: I am Sergio Adrian, a developer and student living in Montevideo, Uruguay...
1.descripcion: My name is Sergio Adrian Fernández Figueredo, a developer and student from Cuba living in Montevideo, Uruguay. I am in my 4th year of the Computer Engineering career. I am 22 years old. I have been passionate about technology and programming from a young age, and I have worked on various personal and collaborative projects that have allowed me to acquire solid practical experience.
